title: ****9/1 ALLSTON LARGE PET-FRIENDLY 4 BED-W/D IN-UNIT, 1/2 FEE PAID
posting_body: AVAILABLE 09/01/2022
1/2 FEE PAID BY OWNER
VIRTUAL TOURS AVAILABLE
Don't miss your chance to see this newly renovated 4 bedroom unit on Cambridge Street in Allston.
Located in the heart of Allston’s Union Square, surrounded by many shops and restaurants.
Easy access to several MBTA bus routes and the MBTA Green Line (B) is just a few minutes away.
Great for commuters with easy access to Mass Pike, Storrow Drive, and Commonwealth Avenue as well as Boston University, Harvard Business School, Boston College, and St. Elizabeth’s Medical Center.
Unit features private washer and dryer and about 1300 sq ft of living space.
Cats & dogs considered by the owner-pet fees apply.
No off-street parking, and students ok with co-signers
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
BenC @
Benjaminapartments .
com
